channel.title: web design on Tiffany Lo
channel.description: Recent content in web design on Tiffany Lo

item.title: True BU
item.description: True BU is one of two slates running for Student Government office in the current elections. Together with graphic designer Calvin Chin and the campaign’s communications staff, we designed a website that portrays the simple and open approach this slate offers to the BU community. We decided to let the content and platform speak for themselves.
